Package de.dlr.proseo.planner.kubernetes

Class KubeJob

java.lang.Object
de.dlr.proseo.planner.kubernetes.KubeJob
@Component public class KubeJob extends Object
A KubeJob describes the complete information to run a Kubernetes job.
Author:
Ernst Melchinger

    • KubeJob

      public KubeJob(int id, String name, String processor, String jobOrderFN, ArrayList<String> args)
      Instantiate a kube job with parameters
      Parameters:
      id - The DB id
      name - The name prefix, if set
      processor - The processor image
      jobOrderFN - The job order file name
      args - Arguments for call

      jobOrderFN - the Job Order file name

    • rebuild

      public KubeJob rebuild(KubeConfig aKubeConfig, io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Job aJob)
      Rebuild kube job entries of processing facility after restart of planner
      Parameters:
      aKubeConfig - The processing facility
      aJob - The Kubernetes job
      Returns:
      The created kube job or null for not proseo jobs

    • createJob

      @Transactional(readOnly=false, propagation=REQUIRES_NEW) public KubeJob createJob(KubeConfig aKubeConfig, String stdoutLogLevel, String stderrLogLevel) throws Exception
      Create the Kubernetes job on processing facility (based on constructor parameters) Method is synchronized to avoid different threads (background dispatching and event-triggered dispatching) to interfere with each other.
      Parameters:
      aKubeConfig - The processing facility
      Returns:
      The kube job
      Throws:
      Exception

      Parameters:
      aJobName - The Kubernetes job name
      Returns:
      true after success

      Parameters:

      Returns:
